original: Golf is a game you spend hours on - away from family, the stresses of the office, and the banality of what has become your bedroom life.  You need to relax.  We are here to take your extracurricular game to a level you never thought possible.  You are already given grief over your recreation.  Stop the cover up.  Stop using a golf weekend as an excuse when you are very close to getting caught taking what is rightfully yours.  Your love affairs are legitimate.  You work hard.  You are balding.  The company depends on you.
translated: 高尔夫是你消磨时光的运动，让你远离家庭，远离职场的压力，远离平淡的卧室生活。你需要放松。我们能把你的婚外生活抬到前所未有的高度。你因为娱乐挨的骂够多了。别再遮遮掩掩了。要被发现的时候别再说自己周末在打高尔夫了，你做的事都是正当行为。你的婚外情是合法的。你辛苦工作，头发掉光，公司全靠你了。

original: Hard working men, stop bumbling around with feeble excuses and paper thin alibis.   Don't rely on your drunken buddies to get their story straight.  Leave your dirty work to the professionals. Golf Lovers Online is a full-service cover-up company offering airtight alibis to the adulterers of America.  A web of lies on the web, so to speak.  Everybody knows that the only way to have great sex in a long-term relationship is to bring in a third party.  About half of all married men are unfaithful at some point in their lives so there is a big market out there for our services.  With modern technology, it is much more difficult to go undetected these days.  Wives will track you with technology any chance they get (ask about our Professional Bug Sweep services).  You have to work a lot harder these days to cover your tracks and destroy the electronic trail. Golf Lovers Online makes sure your alibi is up to par.  We are the honest dishonesty specialists.
translated: 辛苦工作的男人啊，别拿无力的借口和苍白的不在场证据装疯卖傻了，更别指望喝醉的哥们能帮你圆谎了。专业的事就交给专业的人办。高尔夫情人网是一家提供全套隐瞒服务的公司，可以为美国的出轨男性制造严密的不在场证明。可谓是网络上的谎言之网。众所周知，要想在长期的婚姻关系中享受良好的性生活，只能依靠第三者。半数男人在婚后有过出轨行为，所以我们提供的服务大有市场。随着现代科技的发展，想要不被发现也越来越困难了。为了监视丈夫的踪迹，妻子会用尽一切技术手段 (详询我们的窃听器应对专家)。现在想要隐瞒自己的行踪、消除各类电子足迹可是困难多了。高尔夫情人网能够帮你提供可靠的不在场证明。我们是实诚的谎话专家。

original: Do you want your wife to think that you are golfing with the boys in San Andreas while you are actually boning your neighbor's daughter in Cancun?  Do you want to convince her that you are playing 18 holes with a business partner while your intern's legs are wrapped around your head tighter than a vice grip? What she doesn't know won't hurt her.  What she finds out will fuck your income for life.
translated: 想要告诉妻子你在圣安地列斯和兄弟们打高尔夫，实际上却在墨西哥的坎昆干邻居的女儿吗？想让妻子相信你在陪合伙的老板打18洞，实际上却被实习生用老虎钳一样的双腿夹住脑袋吗？不知道这些对妻子没有影响。被她知道你下半辈子的麻烦就大了。

original: Golf Lovers Online has a wide selection of alibi packages available for your extra-marital enjoyment.  You buy it so your wife will buy it!  We can send out fake flight, hotel and car rental confirmations.  We can mail you bogus resort brochures and tee reservations.  We have a 24-hour hotel desk number, staffed by struggling actors with an aptitude for accents.
translated: 高尔夫情人网为你的婚外乐趣提供了范围广泛的不在场证明服务。你向我们买单，你的老婆买账！我们可以寄送伪造的航班、旅馆、租车证明，还可以寄送虚假的景点手册和纪念短袖。我们还提供24小时的宾馆前台电话，由擅长模仿各种口音的演员接听。

original: Our phone routing service enables you to call anywhere in the world, from the comfort of your local lap dancing club.  To convince your wife that you are in the clubhouse instead of the whorehouse, we can overlay your phone calls with a range of different background noises.  We will supply you with phony receipts and your credit card purchases can be channeled through our partner company so that your statement reads 'Las Venturas Golf Club'.  We can provide a digital photo of you on the 18th hole, guaranteed to restore trust in even the most doubting spouse.  For additional authenticity, we can send a postcard from your fictional destination and purchase you a local gift.  It's the little gestures that count.  If you play it right, you might end up getting some ass from your wife as well!  Ask about our special doctors notices that give you an excuse when your wife says she's got a strange discharge from an STD.   You'll have a note that says it's from the water where you were in Puerto Vallarta.  Easy!
translated: 我们的呼叫路由服务允许你从全世界任何地方呼出电话，包括本地脱衣舞俱乐部的包厢。为了让妻子相信你是在正经会所而不是小姐会所，甚至能给你的电话加上不同的背景噪音。我们可以帮你伪造收据，你的信用卡也可以通过我们的合作公司走账，这样账单的收款人上写的就是「拉斯文加斯高尔夫俱乐部」。我们可以提供你在18号洞打球的数码照片，再多疑的妻子见了都会深信不疑。要想更加真实，我们还能从你口中的目的地邮寄明信片，帮你买点当地的土特产和纪念品。细节决定成败。如果演得够好，说不定你的老婆还会给你上床的机会！如果你的老婆发现她莫名其妙地染上了性病，我们的特别医生也能为你开具证明，说这是被巴亚尔塔港的海水感染的。轻轻松松！

original: Getting a hole in one, working on your grip, taking your approach shot, putting from the rough, grounding your club, perfecting your stroke play, driving with your best wood... ah, the innuendos are endless.  Golf is a great game.  You feel inadequate.  Beat your balls senseless and don't let ANY woman stand in your way.  This is your destiny.  She's holding you back.  Golf Lovers Online facilitates that future.
translated: 一杆进洞，锻炼握力，近距离切球，推杆推球，球杆触沙，完美达成比杆赛，挥动你最好的木杆... 啊，无穷无尽的暗示。高尔夫是项好运动。你会感到空虚，毫无知觉地击球，不会让任何女人阻止你前进。这就是你的命运。她在拖你后腿。高尔夫情人网则会助你接近未来。
